body.name: MYMOON HOME Front Load Washer Door Prop with Flexible Suction Cup and Magnetic Attachment, Improves Air Circulation to Reduce Odors, Fits Dryers and Dishwashers, Easy Install (Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 7 hrs 14 mins
features: Front Loader Washer Door Prop – Designed to fit most standard and HE washing machines this door prop allows air to circulate throughout your appliance to prevent odors and improve inside drying efficiency after you’ve run a load.

Flexible Wash Prop Design – Our front load washer door prop is 12” long to make it easier to attach to the door and the machine frame, so you can either attach/remove the magnetic or suction cup sides instantly after adding or removing clothes.

Improve Baby Home Safety – Adding a washer prop to your washing machine can also help prevent kids from opening and accessing the interior, so you can worry less about them accessing the inside and crawling into the machine.

Versatile and Convenient Attachment – Offering hassle-free installation this HE washer door prop can also be used with other common household appliances including your dryer and dishwasher. Important for homes with small children.

Simple Installation Process – This easy-to-use washer front loader door prop utilizes a strong suction cup on one end and a magnetic base on the other to make it simple to install without any tools, drilling, or complicated instructions.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Smart, Simple Connection The innovative design of our front load washer door prop makes it easier to attach and/or remove either end from your machine, so you can hook it up or pull it off depending on if you’re loading or removing clothes. It’s also easy to store until you’re ready to let your washing machine air out once more. Improve Long-Term Clothing Quality By eliminating odors in the machine after washing your clothes you can worry less about those odors transferring to your clothes. This is especially important if you’ve got hard water or other impurities that can impact water quality or smell. Surface Safe Adhesion Our door prop uses a strong suction cup or hook on one end and an equally strong magnet on the other which helps hold it in place without screwing or mounting either side. Minimalist Design The small, white or black cable fits perfectly with a wide range of popular brands and doesn’t detract from the overall look or style, so you don’t have to worry about a gaudy mess.

Universal Brand Support This washer prop can be used with a wide range of top brands including Maytag, Samsung, Whirlpool, LG, Frigidaire, Bosch, Miele, KitchenAid, and more. Reliable Grip Strength The suction cup and the magnet ends are both designed to provide a firmer hold, so small hands can’t pull it open and crawl inside when you aren’t looking. Thoughtful New-Parent Gift These washer door props can be used on a wide range of common appliances which makes them a wonderful baby shower gift idea for new or expectant parents.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best little gadget
reviews.reviewText: I never thought I would need one of these, but I was tired of my washer door slowly closing on it's own. This simple device is fantastic. It holds my washer door open for as long as I need and allows the washer to completely dry out. Since it a string magnet, when not in use, I attach it to the side of the washer. The magnet is so powerful it stays attached during the spin cycle! I would highly recommend this to anyone that has a front loading washing machine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works for me.
reviews.reviewText: I needed something to keep the washing machine door from being pushed closed. You have to walk by it to get to the laundry room sink and my husband would push the door closed when he'd walk by. The washing machine door isn't metal on the inside so I needed one that would hook or suction to it. This was it and at a great price. I use the hook through the latch and it works perfectly. Easy to remove when I need to do laundry and since it has a strong magnet, you can stick it anywhere metal until you're done with the washing machine. It's exactly what I needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It takes a little finagling to get this bent and situated properly but once you get it right it works very well. I’ve always left my front load washer door open to avoid mold problems. Now, it’s securely fastened and out of the way while being open. Good idea.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I don’t have to suck it in anymore!!
reviews.reviewText: Front Load Washer Door Prop( No More having To Suck it in!)I didn’t even know this item existed?This adjustable door prop is perfect because we can have the door open a good 4", which really exposes the seal and allows it to dry. We really needed this because our washer is in a narrow laundry room right by the doorway, so having the door open all the way blocked the doorway. So we would have to suck it in, just to get by. This holds the washer door open just enough that we can walk past without having to suck it in, and also gets enough air flow to dry the seal between loads.The magnet attaching it to the machine is very strong, and you have a choice of a metal hook or a suction cup to attach to the door. It's well made and durable, and very flexible, whether you want to prop your door just an inch, 6", or even more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple and works
reviews.reviewText: Great magnet and several attachments for different washing/dryer machines.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Magnets strong but the arm itself is not. The door will slowly open it up and the hook is too small to get a good latch on any edge

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For front loaders
reviews.reviewText: As most owners of front loaders know, if you don’t dry out the inside of the washer every time and let it air out until the next wash, it smells funny. This is the perfect way to leave your door open just enough to air it out and yet not have it swing in the way. My son had one and I loved it so he bought one for me. A friend came by and saw mine and immediately bought one for herself. We are all very happy with this inexpensive hack!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Odd but works better than others I tried.
reviews.reviewText: I like the magnetic side is easily placed where it works best for you. For me, I spin it down when the washer is running and to swap loads then spin it up and have the suction cup stick to the glass. This keeps the door open enough to avoid mold and also keeps the door from swinging all the way open and being an obstacle in the laundry room.
